name: Flow Fountain
description:
Flow Fountain is a puzzle game of increasing difficulty in which each level is a challenging game of logic and intelligence that will hook you.

Train your mind, solve the different puzzles by making the water flow from its origin to the color fountains. Get the water of each color to flow and find the way to your destination fountain.

Flow Fountain contains 150 free levels with increasing difficulty divided into several packs: Easy, 6x6 pack and 7x7 pack.

The game is suitable for kids, adults, fans of block puzzles and jigsaws, plumber games to train your brain and logic.

Characteristics:
- 150 free puzzles
- Without time limit.
- Boards of different sizes and difficulty.

Download it now and start having fun!
